title: Here is a curated list of 20 influential articles on machine reasoning up to 2020. These articles cover a range of topics including logical reasoning, probabilistic reasoning, neural-symbolic integration, and more
**"A Survey of Machine Reasoning"** by Aditya Kalyanpur, et al
A comprehensive survey on the state of machine reasoning
**"End-to-End Differentiable Proving"** by Tim Rockt√§schel and Sebastian Riedel
Discusses a neural network approach to logical reasoning
**"Neural-Symbolic Learning and Reasoning: A Survey and Interpretation"** by Artur S. d'Avila Garcez, et al
A survey on combining neural networks with symbolic reasoning
**"Probabilistic Reasoning in Intelligent Systems: Networks of Plausible Inference"** by Judea Pearl
Foundational work on probabilistic reasoning and Bayesian networks
**"Neural Logic Machines"** by Honghua Dong, et al
Introduces a neural network architecture for logical reasoning
**"DeepProbLog: Neural Probabilistic Logic Programming"** by Robin Manhaeve, et al
Combines deep learning with probabilistic logic programming
**"Learning to Reason: End-to-End Module Networks for Visual Question Answering"** by Ronghang Hu, et al
Discusses reasoning in the context of visual question answering
**"Inductive Logic Programming: Theory and Methods"** by Stephen Muggleton and Luc De Raedt
A seminal paper on inductive logic programming
**"Differentiable Inductive Logic Programming"** by Richard Evans and Edward Grefenstette
Combines ILP with differentiable programming
**"The Probabilistic Logic Programming Language P-log"** by Chitta Baral, et al
Introduces a probabilistic logic programming language
**"Towards Neural Theorem Proving at Scale"** by William W. Cohen, et al
Discusses scaling neural networks for theorem proving
**"Probabilistic Soft Logic for Relational Machine Learning"** by Stephen H
Introduces a framework for probabilistic reasoning in relational domains
**"Learning to Explain: An Information-Theoretic Perspective on Model Interpretation"** by Been Kim, et al
Discusses interpretability in machine learning models
**"Knowledge Graph Embedding by Translating on Hyperplanes"** by Zhen Wang, et al
Introduces TransH, a method for embedding knowledge graphs
**"Reasoning with Neural Tensor Networks for Knowledge Base Completion"** by Richard Socher, et al
Discusses a neural network approach for knowledge base completion
Combines logical reasoning with neural networks
**"DeepPath: A Reinforcement Learning Method for Knowledge Graph Reasoning"** by Wenhan Xiong, et al
Uses reinforcement learning for reasoning over knowledge graphs
**"The Logic Tensor Networks Framework"** by Luciano Serafini and Artur S. d'Avila Garcez
Introduces a framework for integrating logical reasoning with tensor networks
**"Learning to Compose Neural Networks for Question Answering"** by Jacob Andreas, et al
Discusses modular neural networks for question answering
A foundational paper on neural-symbolic integration
These articles provide a broad overview of the field of machine reasoning, covering both theoretical foundations and practical applications
